##PROBLEM 3

Question - To better understand factors that influence the Balance variable.  Discuss the influential factors and the factors you choose to put in the model.

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ISLR)
str(Credit)
head(Credit)
summary(Credit)
```

Problem Statement - What variables influence the amount of balance a client retains? The entire dataset will be consider when designating a model.

```{r}
zero_Balanceonly=Credit%>% filter(Balance>0)
summary(zero_Balanceonly)
plot(zero_Balanceonly)
```

```{r}
CRMod1<-lm(zero_Balanceonly~., data=Credit)
summary(CRMod1)
par(mfrow=c(2,2))
plot(CRMod1)
anova(CRMod1)
```
```{r}
CRMod2<-lm(Balance~Income+Limit+Rating+Cards+Age+Student, data=Credit)
summary(CRMod2)
par(mfrow=c(2,2))
plot(CRMod2)
anova(CRMod2)
anova(CRMod2,CRMod1)
```

```{r}
attach(Credit)
summary(powerTransform(cbind(Income,Limit,Rating,Cards,Age,Student)))
```

```{r}
CRMod3<-lm(sqrt(Balance)~Income+sqrt(Limit)+sqrt(Rating)+sqrt(Cards)+Age^2+Student, data=Credit)
summary(CRMod3)
par(mfrow=c(2,2))
plot(CRMod3)
anova(CRMod3)
```
